oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from George W. James to Dr. F. M. James
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this postwar letter to his brother Francis Marion James, George James writes about his medical studies. He attended two surgeries and comments about his health and the health of the city, in addition to sharing and asking for news of family and friends. George served as a private during the Civil War in Co. H, 12th Tenn. Inf. Regt. (later Co. F, 47th Tenn. Inf. Regt."
